column1: #Text=We are looking for an experienced website and Android developer to fix an existing app.
#Text=The main task is to add a VPS and payment system to the app.

#Text=The ideal candidate should have experience in Smartphone, Android, Android App Development, HTML, Java, JavaScript, PHP, Web Development, and WordPress.The project is expected to take 1 to 3 months to complete, depending on the complexity of the... issues.

#Text=We need a candidate who is detail-oriented, has excellent communication skills, and can work independently.To apply, please submit a proposal detailing how you can help with the project, your relevant experience, and links to past completed projects.

#Text=We will review all proposals and contact shortlisted candidates for further discussion.Please note that we are looking for a candidate who can start immediately and can commit to the project's timeline.

#Text=We look forward to hearing from you and working with you.Note: Some of the content in this job post may have been auto-generated using advanced AI The ideal candidate should have experience in Smartphone, Android, Android App Development, HTML, Java, JavaScript, PHP, Web Development, and WordPress The project is expected to take 1 to 3 months to complete, depending on the complexity of the issues We need a candidate who is detail-oriented, has excellent communication skills, and can work independently The main task is to add a VPS and payment system to the app
